channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Synology CardDAV Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Synology CardDAV Server

item.title: CVE-2017-15887|2024-08-05T20:04:50.460Z -- synology -- synology%20carddav%20server
item.description: An improper restriction of excessive authentication attempts vulnerability in /principals in Synology CardDAV Server before 6.0.7-0085 allows remote attackers to obtain user credentials via a brute-force attack.
